顈字的基本解释

顈
jiǒng
古书上说的一种像苎麻的草。
古通“褧”，用麻或轻纱制的单层披肩。

顈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǒng］
［《廣韻》口迥切，上迥，溪。］
(1)枲麻之类的植物。似苧，可织布制衣。
(2)通“褧”。

顈字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　顈； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1406第16
【廣韻】【集韻】?胡典切。音峴。【廣韻】顈綴。　又【廣韻】口迥切【集韻】犬迥切，?音褧。【正字通】似苧，可績爲布。【禮·雜記】如三年之喪，則旣顈其練祥皆行。【註】言今之喪，旣服顈，乃爲前三年者，變除而練祥祭也。顈，草名，無葛之鄕，去麻則用顈。　又【五音集韻】襌也。【儀禮·士昏禮】女從者畢袗玄，纚，筓被顈黼在其後。【註】顈，襌也。【疏】讀如詩云褧衣之褧，故爲襌也。　又【集韻】涓熒切，音扃。義同。

顈字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
顈字的起名意思

暂无。

顈
Basic explanation of words
顈
jiǒng
The ancient book said that a kind of grass resembling ramie.
Ancient pass "褧", a single-layer shawl made of hemp or light yarn.
顈
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiǒng］
["Guangyun" mouth is cut, Shangjiong, creek. ]
(1) Plants such as hemp. Like ramie, it can be woven to make clothes.
(2) Through "褧".

[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Hu Dianqie. Yinxian. [Guang Yun] embellishment.　[Guangyun] Mouth cut perfectly [Jiyun] Dog cut perfectly,? Sound. 【Zhengzitong】Like ramie, it can be graded as cloth. 【Ritual·Miscellaneous】As for the funeral of three years, it is all right to practice auspiciousness. [Note] The mourning of the present, and the surrender, is for the first three years, the change and the practice of auspicious sacrifice also.顈, the name of the cursive, no Ge Zhiyong, to go to hemp, use 顈.　[Pentagram Rhyme] Xu Ye. 【Rituals·Shifu】The female followers Bi Yuxuan, 纚,筓 were followed by 顈黼.
